description:
Performs a scripted install of Red Hat Enterprise Linux 6.4 KVM hypervisor using a generic kickstart file.
(c) Copyright 2013, 2014 Hewlett-Packard Development Company, L.P.

Requirements:
* HP ProLiant server with iLO
* IC server provisioning Media Server must contain the OS distribution
* Virtualization must be enabled in the RBSU.

Optional Custom Attributes:
* encrypted_root_password (must be encrypted)
* boot_disk
* kernel_arguments

description:

(c) Copyright 2014 Hewlett-Packard Development Company, L.P.

* HP ProLiant server with iLO must be powered on and running Windows 2012 R2 Standard.
* Media Server share must be writeable.

Optional Custom Attribute:
*CaptureDrive - Drive letter with colon which ImageX wil capture

description: Deletes the custom boot options from the UEFI boot menu.  These are boot options that were added to the UEFI boot menu by previously installed OSs or manually by the user.  This Build Plan removes all the custom boot options, even the one for the currently installed OS, so it should only be run if you are planning to install a new OS, otherwise your currently installed OS may fail to boot.
name: ProLiant HW - Clear UEFI Boot Menu

description:

(c) Copyright 2013 Hewlett-Packard Development Company, L.P.

Note: The server will be booted into the LinuxPE environment where the server's iLO will be registered and then booted back into production.

Requirements:
* Runs only on ProLiant Servers with iLO running Linux
* Appliance must have DHCP/PXE support
* Presence of /sbin/hpbootcfg

name: ProLiant HW - Add Migrated Linux Server
